Title: I Even Met Happy Gypsies
Actors: Bekim Fehmiu, Olivera Katarina, Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic, Mija Aleksic
Plot: Bora the Gypsy is married to an older woman, and he falls in love with the younger Tissa, who is being offered in marriage by her father, to a young gypsy man. This marriage arrangement is ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 3 nominations.
